> Also, note the awesome new grass tile, created by Warren Wilkinson. 

Umm, did you guys update the smoother function to handle the new grass
title?

*goes over to look at the CVS repository*  Nevermind, the answer is
no.  But that really isn't part of the game, only part of a scenario
editor.   If the game can't handle the new tiles, there's no point in
making a scenario editor that can. :-)
